name: SGGG: Segagaga
overview: Set in the year 2025, the story depicts SEGA with only a 3% share of the market. In ÅŒta, Tokyo, the city in which SEGA was established in 1951, the company forms 'Project Segagaga': a plan to save SEGA from its main competitor, the evil DOGMA. As part of Project Segagaga, SEGA takes two teenagers Sega Tarou and Haneda Yayoi and employ them to guide SEGA to the top of the market.
